Room.Name: Lithium Inlet North Walkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a walkway passing through a forest of cypress.
Room.LongDescription: Old and heavy cypress trees stand tall here, and below them is a lush growth of heavy vegetation. If a person went in there, he might become lost. Odd snuffling sounds seem to come from the woods, but when you stop and look in that direction, they also stop. You can hear birds in the distance, but none immediately around you.
